org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master

类 RegionState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.RegionState

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class RegionState
extends Object
    State of a Region while undergoing transitions. This class is immutable.

    • 嵌套类概要
